entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump You're on a massive disinformation campaign. Obamagate. Extortion of Ukraine. Lying. Name calling. Voter suppression. Coronavirus response - it'll just disappear. Saying Russia didn't interfere in 2016.  If Russia wants you and China wants Biden then that's a wash.
